text:
Rosalind Knight (3 December 1933 – 19 December 2020) was an English actress. She acted in "Blue Murder at St Trinian's" (1957), "Carry On Nurse" (1959), "Carry On Teacher" (1959), "Tom Jones" (1963), and "About a Boy" (2002).
She played Beryl in the BBC sitcom "Gimme Gimme Gimme" (1999–2001).
She played Horrible Grandma in "Friday Night Dinner" (2012, 2016–2020).
Knight died on 19 December 2020, aged 87.
